content.question: What statement about Papa Luigi's is the author most likely to agree with?

choices.label: It is a good addition to the town.
It combines Western and Japanese cuisines.
It is famous for its organic pasta.

content.answer: It is a good addition to the town.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
